attributes.action: Allow all driving tests to proceed
attributes.additional_details: Alongside many others we all strongly agree that all driving tests theory and practical should be able to proceed through COVID-19 due to the fact that many people such as myself have recently bought cars or had cars bought for our birthdays, as well as some have been 17 for some time and been learning to drive for a few months to gain the confidence to take the test and spent EXTREME amounts of money on it, all for the new flu and fever to waste all of our time and money. This NEEDS to change.
attributes.background: Have the Government return all DVLA related tests (Practical and theory car test) back on track or at least shorten the waiting time.
